DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate amino acid absorption with two different type of proteins.
DOC.brief_title: Enteral Nutrition and Amino Acid Absorption
DOC.criteria: Patient with gastrointestinal disorder : citrulline plasma concentration < 20 Âµmol/L and/or xylose plasma concentration < 1,7 mmol/L Patient under enteral nutrition at home Patient already receiving 1 L by day Obese patient BMI > 30 Diabetes Renal or liver failure Glucocorticoids treatment
